channel.title: My Dumb Friends
channel.description: Dan and Sean spend half the podcast talking to guests about the baffling choices they've made in life. The other half is Dan St. Germain and Sean Donnelly yelling at each other like an old married couple that should be divorced. It's not for everybody. Produced (and often co-hosted) by Thomas Attila Lewis.

item.title: Episode #151: Tom's Haunting Realizations

[Engineered by Aaron Brungardt]

item.title: Episode #61: The Roast Of Dan St. Germain
item.itunes:author: My Dumb Friends
item.itunes:summary: On June 10th, 2014, we recorded The Roast of Dan St. Germain live at The Stand Comedy Club & Restaurant in NYC. Insults were hurled, questionable jokes and horrific stories were shared - all in honor of Dan St. Germain and the release of his comedy album "Bad At The Good Times." Appearances by but not limited to: Dan St. Germain, Sean Donnelly, Mark Normand, Mike Recine, Yamaneika Saunders, Jared Logan, Jeffrey Joseph, Scott Chaplain, and Henry Zebrowski! Many thanks to The Stand and to Patrick Milligan for making the show and this recording possible!
